dbc01dfd-e08e-4b5a-9385-a4673bf9daf1:
A black ray projects from your pointing finger. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} with the ray to strike a target.
The subject is immediately exhausted for the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} means the creature is only fatigued.
A character that is already fatigued also becomes exhausted.
This spell has no effect on a creature that is already exhausted. Unlike normal exhaustion or fatigue, the effect ends as soon as the spell's duration expires.
3a122c0e-db1a-4d71-9bff-c377bb0b66c4: A fireball {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6) to every creature within the area.[LONGSTART] A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.[LONGEND]
41d6d611-16df-4708-bc49-a67352d3a624: All allies within 30 feet gain resistance to ranged weapons. The subjects gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} 10/magic against ranged weapons.[LONGSTART] This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} doesn't grant you the ability to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} creatures with similar damage reduction.[LONGEND] Once the spell has prevented a total of 10 points of damage per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 100 points), it is discharged.
4b301c2b-3b50-4806-a9d7-d0989e659a9a:
An invisible cone of despair causes great sadness in the subjects. Each affected creature takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
Crushing despair dispels good hope.
e8b51c6c-4f56-42b5-98c5-f986cd68270b:
An invisible cone of despair causes great sadness in the subjects. Each affected creature takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability checks{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.[LONGSTART]
Crushing despair dispels good hope.[LONGEND]
1d6b769c-1991-4d03-86e6-cb8fcd88979c: Any ally within 30 feet becomes temporarily immune to poison. Any poison in its system or any poison to which it is exposed during the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s duration does not affect the subject until the spell's duration has expired. Delay poison does not {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}cure{/g} any {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} that poison may have already caused.
a4399ef4-9118-49c3-9a5d-f0b1de6f1d52:
Any ground-covering vegetation in the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s area becomes very hard and sharply pointed without changing its appearance. In areas of bare earth, roots and rootlets act in the same way. Any creature moving on foot into or through the spell's area takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} for each 5 feet of movement through the spiked area.
Any creature that takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from this spell must also succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or suffer {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}injuries{/g} to its feet and legs that slow its base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} by half. This speed {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} lasts for 1 minute.
d4972d74-f311-4f3f-9237-6a1e5e5eb42f:
As feather step, except this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} affects multiple creatures.
Feather Step: For the duration of this spell, the subject ignores the adverse movement effects of difficult terrain.
a7b96be8-47bd-4ff8-9d02-67a63fed2d10: Calling upon the venomous powers of natural predators, you infect the subject with a horrible poison by making a successful melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. This poison deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d3{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for 6 rounds. Poisoned creatures can make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} each round to negate the damage and end the affliction.
4f050493-adc4-4904-92d2-9fb0d942a22a: Each affected creature gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and cannot cast {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
569e4792-1456-4ec7-8e4d-66ae07262412: Each affected creature gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
548e0213-974b-464f-b0f1-7aec1140089b: Each affected creature gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +1 morale bonus on Will {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. The effect is otherwise identical with a barbarian's rage except that the subjects aren't fatigued at the end of the rage. While in rage, the subject cannot use {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
235a87d3-2b40-448d-8c97-41af13cbbf57: Focusing divine power like a ray of the sun, you project a blast of light from your open palm. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to strike your target. A creature struck by this ray of light takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d8). An undead creature takes 1d6 points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}divine damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6). A construct creature takes only 1d6 points of damage per two caster levels (maximum 5d6).
fa25765f-b23d-4aa5-96dc-479eb4f47677:
Frequency: 1/day; {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Save{/g} Fortitude
Effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and target is fatigued
{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Cure{/g}: 2 consecutive saves
0bb2ae76-52d5-4e5a-8568-9214d3cc49d5:
Frequency: 1/day; {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Save{/g} Fortitude
Effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, target must make an additional Fort save or be permanently blinded
{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Cure{/g}: 2 consecutive saves
8d8ea3c6-3d82-4e73-b770-bd1825c9d5ad: Greater magic fang gives all {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed{/g} strikes of the subject a +1 enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum +5). The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} can affect a slam attack, fist, bite, or any other natural weapon.
89e8ae84-776b-4fdc-b005-7db3d5fb1f32: Immediately upon completion of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, and once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} thereafter, you may call down a 6-foot-wide, 30-foot-long, vertical bolt of lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. The bolt of lightning flashes down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within the spell's range (measured from your position at the time). Any creature in the target square or in the path of the bolt is affected. You need not call a bolt of lightning immediately; other {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, even spellcasting, can be performed first. Each round after the first you may use a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentrating{/g} on the spell) to call a bolt. Each time you cast a bolt, the spell's duration is reduced by one minute.
138f73af-2e15-4f55-b749-56b35ed59acd: Necrotic energy permeates the target, blocking {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} abilities. The subject gains {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to (12 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) against effects that restore {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} or grant temporary hit points. If the target succeeds on a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, fester lasts only a single {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
aed1b973-90ae-4dd4-9756-71b9e1c85e40:
Physical {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against you have a 50% miss chance and the Blind Fight {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} doesn't help opponents, since you're ethereal and not merely invisible. If the attack is capable of striking ethereal creatures, the miss chance is only 20% (for {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g}). Any individually targeted {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} has a 50% chance to fail against you while you're blinking unless your attacker can target invisible, ethereal creatures.
If the attacker can see invisible creatures, the miss chance is also only 20%. For an attacker who can both see and strike ethereal creatures, there is no miss chance.
Likewise, your own attacks have a 20% miss chance. While blinking, you take only half {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} from area attacks (but full damage from those that extend onto the Ethereal Plane). Although you are only partially visible, you are not considered invisible and targets retain their {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against your attacks. You do receive a +2 bonus on attack {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g} made against enemies that cannot see invisible creatures.
99159d5f-61bd-44e8-b3fd-1898cb7a1943: Protection from energy grants temporary immunity to the type of energy you specify when you cast it (acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic). When the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} absorbs 12 points per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} (to a maximum of 120 points at 10th level), it is discharged.
5283784d-4b17-497e-8028-ed863cc83114: Remove curse can remove all curses on an object or a creature. If the target is a creature, you must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + caster level) against the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of each curse affecting the target. Success means that the curse is removed.
f458330b-91f7-4c2a-9afd-3d6c59a68844: Stinking cloud creates a bank of fog like that created by fog cloud, except that the vapors are nauseating. Living creatures in the cloud become nauseated. This condition lasts as long as the creature is in the cloud and for {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g}+1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} after it leaves. (Roll separately for each nauseated character.) Any creature that succeeds on its {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} but remains in the cloud must continue to save each round. This is a poison effect.
484fd3ab-14cf-471e-ad54-be91bbde1ae3: Target unit gains a +1 bonus to saving throws and AC and DR 1/- for 3 rounds, and also a +(20 + Power/5) bonus to combat morale. This is an Arcane spell with a mind-affecting effect.
1afc4a62-4c71-4489-b52e-866bb1841a89: Target unit receives a -2 penalty to attack, a -5 penalty to initiative, and a -30 penalty to combat morale. This is a mind-affecting effect.
f9bb377b-0e66-4924-9576-16af20fc2ba2:
The subject contracts one of the following diseases: blinding sickness, bubonic plague, cackle fever, mindfire, or shakes. The disease is contracted immediately (the onset period does not apply).
Blinding Sickness effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, target must make an additional Fort {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} or be permanently blinded
Bubonic Plague effect: 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} damage and target is fatigued
Cackle Fever effect: 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wis{/g} damage
Mindfire effect: 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Int{/g} damage
Shakes effect: 1d8 {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dex{/g} damage.
16e7e4fe-0151-4516-b767-54e71f44be77:
The subject contracts the following disease: Blinding Sickness.[LONGSTART] The disease is contracted immediately (the onset period does not apply).[LONGEND]
Frequency: 1/day
Effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Str{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, target must make an additional Fort {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} or be permanently blinded
{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Cure{/g}: 2 consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}
24f0a47c-b379-4d4a-8a0e-0ca033d85574:
The subject contracts the following disease: Bubonic Plague.[LONGSTART] The disease is contracted immediately (the onset period does not apply).[LONGEND]
Frequency: 1/day
Effect: {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Con{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and target is fatigued
{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Cure{/g}: 2 consecutive {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}
1dd2d281-f3f2-4ab1-816d-7a2491f9612b: This abjuration grants all allies within a 25-foot radius limited protection from {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of whichever one of five energy types you select: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The subject gains resist energy 10 against the energy type chosen, meaning that each time the creature is subjected to such damage (whether from a natural or magical source), that damage is reduced by 10 points before being applied to the creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}.[LONGSTART] The value of the {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}energy resistance{/g} granted increases to 20 points at 7th level and to a maximum of 30 points at 11th level.[LONGEND]
54fe91e7-df39-41b8-9d39-e7ebf8dfae6d: This creature has {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} against effects that restore {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} or grant temporary hit points.
38920ea7-6e29-40e0-ac98-0f0f242ac513: This functions as longstrider, except it gives you a +20-foot enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your base {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}.
34dec557-ad81-4e58-a93b-a4f01287f668: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} charges your hand with telekinetic force. Your successful melee {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of force {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per level (maximum 10d4) and causes the target to be pushed away from you in a straight line up to 5 feet per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} negates the movement but not the damage.
2f1b2483-6867-45be-ac72-c2fd8fb3526d:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} curses the creature touched, making it inimical to the natural world. All animals have an initial attitude of hostile toward the target. If the target has an animal companion, it does not become hostile, but as long as the target remains cursed, their animal companion takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. The target also takes a –10 penalty on {g|Encyclopedia:Lore_Nature}Lore (nature){/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} as the weather and environment themselves seem to conspire to cause trouble.
Nature's exile can be removed with break enchantment, limited wish, miracle, remove curse, or wish.
96ce1a8e-ef0f-48b0-9033-be0425cf2948:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions as chameleon stride, except it confers its {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} upon all allies within 10 feet of you at the time the spell is cast. If an affected creature moves more than 10 feet away from you, it loses the benefit of the spell. Creatures that move into the area after the spell is cast do not gain its benefit.
Chameleon Stride: You fade into the background, and while you are not truly invisible, you are hard to pinpoint due to your translucent state. While under the effects of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you gain a +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth checks{/g} and have {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} from creatures more than 5 feet away ({g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} have a 20% miss chance).
d4e9ddd1-a36a-418d-8905-6553eacfae53:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like dominate person, except that the spell is restricted by creature type: animal.
Dominate Person: You can make any humanoid creature fight on your side as if it was your ally. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability. However, this creature will try to throw off the domination, making a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
f7004a79-277a-48c5-aa75-11afcbcd9084:
This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} functions like sleep, except that it affects 10 HD of targets.
Sleep: A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 4 HD of creatures, and those who are closest to the spell's point of origin are affected first. HD that are not sufficient to affect a creature are wasted. Sleeping creatures are {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}. Wounding awakens an affected creature, but normal noise does not. Sleep does not target {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} creatures, constructs, or undead creatures.
ca8cc82f-e0e3-4c74-a041-61b4f6c12f14: This {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} imbues a single creature with great bravery and morale in battle. The target gains a +2 morale {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}.
f02e8bf5-b00a-413d-a94d-8ebc0451c9d1:
When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} + 1 point per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum +15).
Since undead are powered by negative energy, this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} cures such a creature of a like amount of damage, rather than harming it.
6d143356-5f49-4b47-8850-e3720c278ff8: When you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, you draw the life force from the surrounding land and hurl it at your enemies, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of positive {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (to a maximum of 12d6 at 12th level) to any undead creatures in the spell's area.
511453ae-5c18-42ee-85fa-abccd8db9aaa: With this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} you designate the target as your favored enemy for the remainder of its duration. For the duration of the spell, you treat the target as if it were a favored enemy for all purposes.
2b991677-22c4-4da1-9c84-399994205fea: You and all your allies within 25 feet can see any objects or beings that are invisible within your range of vision.
1a6703bc-cac6-41ed-844f-974832f8296e: You bring special favor upon yourself and your allies while bringing disfavor to your enemies. You and each of your allies gain a +1 luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g}, while each of your foes takes a –1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on such {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}rolls{/g}.
a2573421-1256-4211-a225-1d89bf3ba581:
You can use dispel magic to end one area effect from a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} in the selected point.
You make one dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) and compare that to the spell with highest caster level ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 11 + the spell's caster level). If successful, that spell ends. If not, compare the same result to the spell with the next highest caster level. Repeat this process until you have dispelled one area effect in the selected point, or you have failed to dispel every area effect.
1f6aa2a5-5151-4601-85a0-030a6ca4f5d1: You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that has been cast on a creature or one area effect from a spell in the selected point.
5c57b422-f70c-4db0-92c1-1684b2a41471:
You can use dispel magic to end one ongoing {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} that has been cast on a creature.
You make one dispel {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d20{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g}) and compare that to the spell with highest caster level ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 11 + the spell's caster level). If successful, that spell ends. If not, compare the same result to the spell with the next highest caster level. Repeat this process until you have dispelled one spell affecting the target, or you have failed to dispel every spell.
fbd233cd-6c3b-4067-aa47-b3c9c270783c: You cause a single opponent to become profoundly stricken with intense grief. They can take no {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}actions{/g}, take a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, and lose their {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} (if any). They can attempt a new {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} to break the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s effect.
13b372a3-8b02-421f-b80f-6df6a35f84de: You create an area of {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} mud. The mud functions as difficult terrain. When a creature enters the mud, it is healed of {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}ability damage{/g}. A creature can be healed of ability {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} this way only once per day. Also, each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} after, the mud restores 1 hit point to the creature; this healing is unaffected by effects that increase a creature's healing.
fed5478b-d050-4b9f-a2d4-318bf26c65f0:
You create an extradimensional hole with a depth of 10 feet per two {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum 50 feet). The pit is lined with wickedly sharp spikes along its bottom and walls.
Any large or smaller creature standing in the area where you first conjured the pit must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} to jump to safety in the nearest open space. In addition, the edges of the pit are sloped, and any creature ending its turn on a square adjacent to the pit must make a Reflex saving throw with a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to avoid falling into it. Creatures subjected to an effect intended to push them into the pit (such as bull rush) do not get a saving throw to avoid falling in if they are affected by the pushing effect.
Creatures who fall into the pit take falling {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} as normal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} per 10 feet), plus 2d6 points of piercing damage from spikes. To climb the pit's coarse stone walls, a creature needs a successful {g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}Athletics{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}Mobility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} with a {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of 25. When the duration of the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} ends, creatures within the hole rise up with the bottom of the pit until they are standing on the surface over the course of a single {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
26ff1ac2-9cca-4beb-8f9b-beaaac959d99: You fill an enemy's head with waking dreams, a reminder of the pleasures, delights, and terrors to be found in the dream world. While in this strange dream state, the target moves at half its normal {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}. Multiple haze of dreams effects do not stack, nor does this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s effect stack with slow.
9d0a04b2-da8f-40f6-90a3-2e756b08db44: You gain a powerful aura, similar to an archon's aura of menace. Any hostile creature within a 20-foot radius of you must succeed at a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will save{/g} to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it takes a –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} and saving throws and to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} for the duration of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, or until it successfully hits you with an attack. A creature that has resisted or broken the effect cannot be affected again by this particular casting of archon's aura.
6209ca2f-0513-4baa-8fc9-8642c6d0665d:
You hurl a fist-sized ball of force resembling a sphere of spikes to ram a designated creature. You must succeed on a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} to strike your target. On a successful hit, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of force {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per two caster levels (maximum 5d6). For every 5 caster levels you possess beyond 5th, you gain an additional ball of force.
A creature struck by any of these is subject to a bull rush attempt. The force has a {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} modifier (whichever is highest). The {g|Encyclopedia:CMB}CMB{/g} for the force's bull rush uses your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} as its {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g}, adding the force's Strength modifier and a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for each additional blast that hits. If the bull rush succeeds, the force pushes the creature away from you in a straight line, and the creature must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} or fall prone.
ba206eb2-5688-492b-ba90-7a379a4ba1d8:
You imbue a suit of armor or a shield with an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +1 per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum +5 at 20th level).[LONGSTART]
An outfit of regular clothing counts as armor that grants no {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} bonus for the purpose of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.[LONGEND]
dc7b907f-3ef6-4481-98d5-9f8501a12219:
You imbue a suit of armor with an enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} of +1 per four {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster levels{/g} (maximum +5 at 20th level).[LONGSTART]
An outfit of regular clothing counts as armor that grants no {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} bonus for the purpose of this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.[LONGEND]
6bbe4c51-eebc-4acc-a99b-ea29b7b9e507: You may call down a 6-foot-wide, 30-foot-long, vertical bolt of lightning that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g}. The bolt of lightning flashes down in a vertical stroke at whatever target point you choose within medium range.
45c5cee4-7955-4f78-a73e-9eb26964879c: You release a powerful stroke of electrical energy that deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 10d6) to each creature within its area. The bolt begins at your fingertips.
62abb4fc-193c-403f-a97c-f27c30343f0e: You spit a stream of venom at a target using a ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g}. If the venom hits, it causes blindness for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. The target must also {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} or be poisoned by black adder venom; the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} in successive rounds of the poison is equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}'s DC.
7264687e-5999-455d-a44c-3b5786e7531a: You take on an aspect of an angelic being, including some of its physical characteristics. You gain resistance to acid and cold 10, and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/evil. You also gain a +2 deflection {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and a +2 resistance bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saves{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made or effects created by evil creatures. In addition, your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} and any weapons you wield are considered {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} reduction.
46506c39-8f3c-489c-bb8c-6ae3a3c92d22: You whisper a single word in the primordial language of good that is anathema to the minions of evil and strengthens the resolve of good creatures. Evil creatures within the burst must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g} or become sickened for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}/level. Evil outsiders with the evil subtype, {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil-aligned{/g} dragons, and undead in the burst also take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} if they fail their saves. Good-aligned creatures in the burst gain a +2 sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls for 1 round.
ab62f7ff-a7b8-474c-80ba-f62e808145ae: You {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch{/g} an object when you cast this {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, causing the object to shed bright light in a 60-foot radius. This illumination increases the light level for an additional 60 feet by one step (darkness becomes dim light, dim light becomes normal light, and normal light becomes bright light).[LONGSTART] Creatures that take {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} in bright light take them while within the 60-foot radius of this magical light. Despite its name, this spell is not the equivalent of daylight for the purposes of creatures that are {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaged{/g} or destroyed by such light.[LONGEND]
01d607ee-becd-4abc-9e9f-3cfa191fa598: Your call lightning, call lightning storm, and storm call deal more {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
a8b8f0e5-0de5-4e9b-af73-8fceb242295b: [LONGSTART]You strike the ground in front of you, filling the area in front of you with the thunder of pounding drums. [LONGEND]Any creature in the area takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} points of sonic {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} per {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} (maximum 5d8) and is knocked prone. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude save{/g} halves the damage and negates being knocked prone.
186cb4ff-dcff-4981-a14c-7b7640623935:

{g|Encyclopedia:Healing}Cure{/g}: 1 save
